title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: When everything was "a' bye," as we say locally, Benthead kindlyoffered to drive me down to the mill; but, as the early morning was sodelightfully fine, and nature outside so pleading and inviting, I tookto the moor on "Shanks' naigie."
